name: Home Is Where Your Giant Pig Is
name_original: Home Is Where Your Giant Pig Is
description:
Global Game Jam - January 2019

Defend yourself and your home from bugs in this wave survival game.

Keep going until either you die or all your cool stuff gets broken. The pig doesn't care, it's just gonna keep walking forever, probably.

Gamedev - Riv Hester https://twitter.com/Ahr_Ech

Sound & Music - Zack Calabro https://twitter.com/a_butthole69
